page.title: 16SERVICES IN DALWOOD.
page.content: There is a bus from Dalwood to Axminster once a week on Thursday, which is Market Day.The bus leaves at 10.30 and returns at 2.15.The milkman comes every Monday,wednesday and Friday about 11:00.The dustman comes every Tuesday also about 11:00.The paper man comes every day about 9:30. There is also a bus to Honiton every Thursday. . The school services go to Axminster, Colyton, and Woodruff in Lyme Regis. All these school services are provided by Sewards coaches.Once a week there is a van delivering fruit,vegetables and bread,known as 'Fruity Fred'.Every fortnight a library van comes from Honiton.There are two post collections a day from Monday to Friday,one on Saturday and one on good Friday.
